column2: The local culture of [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] in my capital, [Root.Capital.GetName], has grown upon me and my family. We could choose to embrace it, which would bring numerous benefits, or we could keep to our old ways, which might also have its advantages.
My family and I will stay [Root.Culture.GetName].

Your vassal §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has decided to put aside [From.GetPossPronoun] §Y[emf_old_culture.GetName]§! culture and adopt the language and customs of your §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture.
